title: 2020 US Open – Wheelchair men's doubles
text: <a href="Alfie%20Hewett">Alfie Hewett</a> and <a href="Gordon%20Reid%20%28tennis%29">Gordon Reid</a> were the three-time defending champions and successfully defended their Wheelchair Men's Doubles tennis title at the <a href="2020%20US%20Open%20%28tennis%29">2020 US Open</a>, defeating <a href="St%C3%A9phane%20Houdet">Stéphane Houdet</a> and <a href="Nicolas%20Peifer">Nicolas Peifer</a> in the final, 6–4, 6–1, in a repeat of the <a href="2018%20US%20Open%20%28tennis%29">2018 US Open</a> final.
